page.title: 13HOMES
page.content: We delivered questionnaires round our area asking people about their homes and lives.This is what we found out. {Fuel. People use several differant kinds of fuel in this area.Nobody uses parrafin or gas as fuel.They either use solid fuel,electricity or a mixture of both. 5 people use just electricity.Nobody uses just solid fuel but 13 people use both electricity and solid fuel. {Central Heating} 8 houses have central heating.10 people don't have central heating. This means less than half of the homes have central heating. {Telephone All 18 houses have telephones.So in an emergancy it is easy to get help. {Water 2 homes use mains,5 well,3 river,7 spring and 1 river and spring water.
